mapper.sql: article_id, article_title, mdContent, htmlContent, article_summary, category_id, user_id, publishDate, editTime, article_state, article_pageviews, article_likes, article_comments
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from article
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into article (article_id, article_title, mdContent, htmlContent, article_summary, category_id, user_id, publishDate, editTime, article_state, article_pageviews, article_likes, article_comments) values (#{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{articleTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mdcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{htmlcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{publishdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{edittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{articleState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{articlePageviews,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{articleLikes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{articleComments,jdbcType=INTEGER})

article_id,
article_title,

htmlContent,
article_summary,
category_id,
user_id,
publishDate,
editTime,
article_state,
article_pageviews,

mapper.update:
update article
article_title = #{articleTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mdContent = #{mdcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
htmlContent = #{htmlcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
article_summary = #{articleSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
publishDate = #{publishdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
editTime = #{edittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
article_state = #{articleState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
article_pageviews = #{articlePageviews,jdbcType=INTEGER},
article_likes = #{articleLikes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
article_comments = #{articleComments,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where article_id = #{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
